snippet: Mayor Bloomberg has done a lot to improve public health, but he overreaches with a new plan to limit the sale of large size sugary drinks.
abstract: Editorial criticizes New York City Mayor Michael Bloomberg for overreaching with his plan to limit the sale of large size sugary drinks; holds administration should instead be focusing on programs that educate and encourage people to make sound choices.
lead_paragraph: Mayor Bloomberg has done a lot to improve public health, but he overreaches with a new plan to limit the sale of large size sugary drinks.
